Summary: I was outside around 7:15 PM saw a bright star like object.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside around 7:15 PM saw a bright star like object thought it was a star at first then saw it moving very slow so I got my video camera out and started filming, I have seen them a number of times in my area they very in color some are white some are red and some are multi-color. The video is zoomed in X40.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Shelby Township
There were 2 other sightings in Shelby Township on or around October 27th 2013
